description.value: As a Utilize|XPHB action, you can tie a knot with Rope if you succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand|XPHB) check. The Rope can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics|XPHB) check. You can bind an unwilling creature with the Rope only if the creature has the Grappled|XPHB, Incapacitated|XPHB, or Restrained|XPHB condition. If the creature's legs are bound, the creature has the Restrained|XPHB condition until it escapes. Escaping the Rope requires the creature to make a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Acrobatics|XPHB) check as an action.
